attributes.action: withdraw the exemption from council tax for members of religious communities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Members of religious communities are currently exempt from paying full council tax. This is not in view of any charitable work - being such a member seems to be sufficient. This means that non-believers are subsidising them - an absurd and offensive situation

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "withdraw the exemption from council tax for members of religious communities."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15391.asp
